content.content: Hey Uniswap Community, I recently received a grant from the Uniswap Foundation Grants Program to establish Monthly Financial Reporting for the DAO. The Short version of November’s report is available here : Uniswap Financial Report - Nov 22.pdf - Google Drive The Long version is available here : [AsD : 5] Uniswap Financial Reporting - Nov 22 - by adalhi TLDR :  Uniswap generated 54m USD in Trading Fees during November :  75% came from Uniswap v3 - Ethereum. 14% from Layer 2s . 11% from Uniswap v2.   ETH/USDC pools contributed 52% of Uniswap v3 - Ethereum Trading Volume. ETH/USDC 5bps pool contributed 46% of Uniswap v3 - Ethereum and 37% of Uniswap Protocol Trading Volume. Pools made of Top Tier Assets Pairs (ETH, USDC, wBTC, USDT and DAI) contributed 88% of Uniswap v3 - Ethereum Trading Volume.  If you have any comments, feel free to reach out on Twitter : https://twitter.com/AsymmetricDefi
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining the Monthly Financial Reporting proposal for Uniswap, which has received a grant from the Uniswap Foundation Grants Program. The post provides a short and long version of the November report, which includes information on the trading fees generated by Uniswap during the month. The post invites comments and feedback on Twitter.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
